column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Speaking of the staff
column2: they are delightful and unflappable.  My dad has quite poor vision these days
column3: especially in low light.  With how dark this place is
column4: you definitely need a few minutes for your eyes to adjust.  Long story short
column5: we ran into some new friends of ours when we arrived for our reservation and my dad (to my dismay) decided he was going to get a picture with them. Flash and all.  In the middle of the floor of the busy
column7: dark restaurant.  I was trying to get him to stop
column8: but the waitstaff were incredibly kind and even helped him get a picture.  Kudos to all of you there for being so accommodating -- you earned every penny of my unusually large tip.
